general: Dear Sagittarius, lower your guard with those who know you best. Your spirit yearns for relief that only the release of your burdens can offer, allowing for true support. With the Moon in Cancer aligning with the nodes of fate, embrace the support systems around you. By showing vulnerability, you will gain valuable insights. Also, be aware of how you protect your own emotions, as your emotional armor may require some adjustments. Pay attention to the energy surrounding you, especially when the Moon, Jupiter, Mercury, and Venus form unbalanced aspects in various social circles.
love: Be open to sharing your emotions with your partner, as it will strengthen your bond.
work: Do not hesitate to ask for help from your colleagues, collaboration is key today.
health: Take the time to rest and center yourself, a small break will do you great good.
teaser: Free yourself and welcome the support of others.
